headline: TEAMSTERS DEMAND FAIR CONTRACT AT RALPHS
summary: After more than two months of negotiations, Teamsters at Ralphs, a wholly owned subsidiary of Kroger, are demanding a strong contract before their current agreement expires on Sunday, Sept. 21. If Kroger fails to come to terms on a fair deal, the company faces a potential labor dispute that could disrupt its supply chain across Southern California, affecting hundreds of Ralphs and Food 4 Less markets.
